allow: Bash(for func in admin-auth pricing-manager vehicle-manager feedback-manager locations-lookup uploads-presigned document-comments fixed-routes-manager)

Bash(for RESOURCE_ID in t1rb6n t64n8c v16n7o)

Bash(do echo "Updating resource $RESOURCE_ID..." MSYS_NO_PATHCONV=1 aws apigateway update-integration-response --rest-api-id qcfd5p4514 --resource-id $RESOURCE_ID --http-method OPTIONS --status-code 200 --patch-operations "[{""op"":""replace"",""path"":""/responseParameters/method.response.header.Access-Control-Allow-Origin"",""value"":""''''https://durdle.flowency.build''''""}]" --region eu-west-2)

Bash(for func in locations-lookup uploads-presigned document-comments feedback-manager fixed-routes-manager pricing-manager vehicle-manager bookings-manager admin-auth quotes-manager quotes-calculator)
